_header: Little wot it any man how true love bi-standeth
Note: For a similar piece on the love of Christ see 3137; for another piece on the love of women see 3136.
_description: A song of the love of Our Lady — one stanza only

BLEge613.Transcription:
Litel uo it eniman on trewe loue bistodetbute oure swete leuedi
                    þat muchel þer of haud fondetThe love of hire hit lassted swthe
                    longeHe oaweþ ws plist he wele hus underfongeOwre mo is mi lif
                    and ic in grete þotei þenke of hire þat al hure blisse hus
                    broute
